Name: VHIL_H100_VehFunc_ODO_Reset_DID_LessThan300km_Neutral
Test Case Description: To verify the Reset ODO value through DID, when ODO value is less than 300km at Neutral gear
Pre-Action:
1.Set Battery Voltage to 13.5V

2.Turn Ignition ON[Ignition_SW_IP= 1]

3.Crank the vehicle[HIL_Engine_Start_SW=1]

4.No CAN failure & ODO related failure should not be present

5.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS= Neutral [GEAR_POSITION[0x150=0x2]

6.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED = 0kmph
Test Steps.Action:
1.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS= 3rd[GEAR_POSITION[0x150=0x7]

2.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS 30% to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED = 50kmph.

3.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve [ODO_CLUSTER[0X550] = 190km]

At step 3:

Cluster should display,

a)ODO_CLUSTER [0x550] = "190"km

b)3rd gear, 50Kmph

EMS should publish,

a)ENGINE_STATUS [0x151] = 0[Running]

4.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS= Neutral [GEAR_POSITION[0x150=0x2]

5.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED = 0kmph

6.Write ODO value through DID value[E119] =0km [ODO_CLUSTER[0X550] = 0][For All ODO values writing procedure please refer Sheet 3]

At step 6:

Cluster should display,

a)ODO_CLUSTER [0x550] = "0"km

b)Neutral gear, 0Kmph

EMS should publish,

a)ENGINE_STATUS [0x151] = 0[Running]
Post-Action:
1.Turn Ignition OFF[Ignition_SW_IP= 0]

2. Set Battery Voltage to 0V

Name: VHIL_H100_VehFunc_ODO_Reset_DID_forthAttempt_LessThan300km_Neutral
Test Case Description: To verify the Reset ODO value through DID for 4th time, when ODO value is less than 300km at Neutral gear
Pre-Action:
1.Set Battery Voltage to 13.5V

2.Turn Ignition ON[HIL_Mdl_HIL_Mdl_Ignition_SW_IP= 1]

3. Crank the vehicle[HIL_Mdl_Engine_Start_SW=1]

4.No CAN failure & ODO related failure should not be present

5.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS= Neutral [GEAR_POSITION[0x150=0x2]

6.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED = 0kmph
Test Steps.Action:
1..Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS= 3rd[GEAR_POSITION[0x150=0x7]

2.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED ~= 50kmph.

3.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve [ODO_CLUSTER[0X550] = 10km]

At step 3

Cluster should display,

a)ODO_CLUSTER [0x550] = "10"km

b)3rd gear, 50Kmph

4.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS= Neutral [GEAR_POSITION[0x150=0x2]

5.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED ~= 0kmph

6.Write ODO value through DID value[E119] =20km [ODO_CLUSTER[0X550] = 0]

At step 6

Cluster should display,

a)ODO_CLUSTER [0x550] = "20"km

b)Neutral gear, 0Kmph

7.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS= 1st[GEAR_POSITION[0x150=0x1]

8.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED ~= 30kmph.

9.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve [ODO_CLUSTER[0x550] = 105km]

At step 9

Cluster should display,

a)ODO_CLUSTER [0x550] = "105"km

b)1st gear, 30Kmph

10.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS= Neutral [GEAR_POSITION[0x150=0x2]

11.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED ~= 0kmph

12.Write ODO value through DID value[E119] =200km

[ODO_CLUSTER[0X550] = 4]

At step 12:

Cluster should display,

a)ODO_CLUSTER [0x550] = "200"km

b)Neutral gear, 0Kmph

13.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve [ODO_CLUSTER[0x550] = 295km]

At step 13

Cluster should display,

a)ODO_CLUSTER [0x550] = "295"km

b)1st gear, 30Kmph

14.Write ODO value through DID value[E119] =299km

[ODO_CLUSTER[0X550] = 299]

At step 14:

Cluster should display,

a)ODO_CLUSTER [0x550] = "298"km["299Km" reset will not happen, since reset is for 4th time]

b)Neutral gear, 0Kmph
Post-Action:
1.Turn Ignition OFF[HIL_Mdl_Ignition_SW_IP= 0]

2. Set Battery Voltage to 0V

Name: VHIL_H100_VehFunc_ODO_Reset_DID_SpeedNotZero_1stGear
Test Case Description: To verify the Reset ODO value through DID, when the speed is not equal to "0" at 1st gear
Pre-Action:
1.Set Battery Voltage to 13.5V

2.Turn Ignition ON[HIL_Mdl_Ignition_SW_IP= 1]

3. Crank the vehicle[HIL_Mdl_Engine_Start_SW=1]

4.No CAN failure & ODO related failure should not be present

5.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS= Neutral [GEAR_POSITION[0x150=0x2]

6.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED = 0kmph
Test Steps.Action:
1..Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS= 2nd[GEAR_POSITION[0x150=0x4]

2.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED ~= 30kmph.

3.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve [ODO_CLUSTER[0X550] = 90km]

At step 3

Cluster should display,

a)ODO_CLUSTER [0x550] = "90"km

b)2nd gear, 30Kmph

4.Write ODO value through DID value[E119] =0km [ODO_CLUSTER[0x550] = 0]

At step 4

Cluster should display,

a)ODO_CLUSTER [0x550] = "90"km[ODO reset will not happen at speed!=0]

b)2nd gear,30kmph
Post-Action:
1.Turn Ignition OFF[HIL_Mdl_Ignition_SW_IP= 0]

2. Set Battery Voltage to 0V

Name: VHIL_H100_VehFunc_ODO_Reset_DID_MoreThan300km_Neutral
Test Case Description: To verify the Reset ODO value through DID, when ODO value is more than 300km at Neutral gear
Pre-Action:
1.Set Battery Voltage to 13.5V

2.Turn Ignition ON[HIL_Mdl_Ignition_SW_IP= 1]

3.Crank the vehicle[HIL_Mdl_Engine_Start_SW=1]

4.No CAN failure & ODO related failure should not be present

5.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS= Neutral [GEAR_POSITION[0x150=0x2]

6.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED = 0kmph
Test Steps.Action:
1..Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS= 5th[GEAR_POSITION[0x150=0xB]

2.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED ~= 70kmph.

3.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve [ODO_CLUSTER[0X550] = 390km]

At step 3

Cluster should display,

a)ODO_CLUSTER [0x550] = "390"km

b)5th gear, 70Kmph

4.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS= Neutral [GEAR_POSITION[0x150=0x2]

5.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED ~= 0kmph

6.Write ODO value through DID value[E119] =0km [ODO_CLUSTER[0x550] = 0]

At step 6

Cluster should display,

a)ODO_CLUSTER [0x550] = "390"km[ODO reset cannot happen more than 300km]

b)Neutral gear, 0Kmph
Post-Action:

2. Set Battery Voltage to 0V

Name: VHIL_H100_VehFunc_ODO_Reset_DID_SpeedFault_InvalidSignal
Test Case Description:
To verify the Reset ODO value through DID, when there is speed fault
(Rear & Front Wheel Speed Senor signal is invalid)
Pre-Action:
1.Set Battery Voltage to 13.5V

2.Turn Ignition ON[Ignition_SW_IP= 1]

3.Crank the vehicle[HIL_Engine_Start_SW=1]

4.No CAN failure & ODO related failure should not be present

5.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS= Neutral [GEAR_POSITION[0x150=0x2]

6.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED = 0kmph
Test Steps.Action:
1.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS= 4th[GEAR_POSITION[0x150=0x8]

2.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED = 45kmph.

3.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve [ODO_CLUSTER[0X550] = 140km]

At step 3

Cluster should display,

a)ODO_CLUSTER [0x550] = "140"km

b) 4th gear, 45Kmph

4.a.Perform Open Circuit for [WSS_REAR_IP]

BUS_ABS_DATA_3_0x451_WHEEL_SPEED_REAR[0x451=0x3]; Signal Invalid

4.b.Perform Open Circuit for [WSS_FRONT_IP]

BUS_ABS_DATA_3_0x451_WHEEL_SPEED_FRONT[0x451=0x3]; Signal Invalid

5.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS= Neutral [GEAR_POSITION[0x150=0x2]

6.Write ODO value through DID value[E119] =0km [ODO_CLUSTER[0X550] = 0]

After step 6:

ABS should publish

a) DISTANCE_REAR = Invalid

b) DISTNACE_FRONT = Invalid

c)WSS_REAR = Invalid

d)WSS_FRONT = Invalid

Cluster should display,

a)ODO_CLUSTER [0x550] = "140"km[Because of WSS failure]
Post-Action:
1.Turn Ignition OFF[Ignition_SW_IP= 0]

2. Set Battery Voltage to 0V

Name: VHIL_H100_VehFunc_ODO_Reset_DID_SpeedFault_SensorDefective
Test Case Description:
To verify the Reset ODO value through DID, when there is speed fault
(Rear & Front Wheel Speed Senor is defective)
Pre-Action:
1.Set Battery Voltage to 13.5V

2.Turn Ignition ON[Ignition_SW_IP= 1]

3. Crank the vehicle[HIL_Engine_Start_SW=1]

4.No CAN failure & ODO related failure should not be present

5.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS= Neutral [GEAR_POSITION[0x150=0x2]

6.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED = 0kmph
Test Steps.Action:
1.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS= 4th[GEAR_POSITION[0x150=0x8]

2.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED = 55kmph.

3.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve [ODO_CLUSTER[0X550] = 180km]

At step 3:

Cluster should display,

a)ODO_CLUSTER [0x550] = "180"km

b)4th gear, 55Kmph

4.a.Perform Open Circuit for [WSS_REAR_IP]

BUS_ABS_DATA_3_0x451_WHEEL_SPEED_REAR[0x451=0x2]; Sensor Defect

4.b.Perform Open Circuit for [WSS_FRONT_IP]

BUS_ABS_DATA_3_0x451_WHEEL_SPEED_FRONT[0x451=0x2]; Sensor Defect

After step 4:

ABS should publish

a) DISTANCE_REAR = Invalid

b) DISTNACE_FRONT = Invalid

c)WSS_REAR = Invalid

d)WSS_FRONT = Invalid

Cluster should display,

a)ODO_CLUSTER [0x550] = "180"km

2. Set Battery Voltage to 0V

Name: VHIL_H100_VehFunc_ODO_TextBlink_InvalidSignal_Reserved
Test Case Description:
To verify the Reset ODO value through DID, when there is speed fault
(Front Wheel Speed Senor is defective)
Pre-Action:
1.Set Battery Voltage to 13.5V

2.Turn Ignition ON[Ignition_SW_IP= 1]

3. Crank the vehicle[HIL_Engine_Start_SW=1]

4.No CAN failure & ODO related failure should not be present

5.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS= Neutral [GEAR_POSITION[0x150=0x2]

6.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED = 0kmph
Test Steps.Action:
1.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS= 3rd[GEAR_POSITION[0x150=0x8]

2.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED = 35kmph.

3.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve [ODO_CLUSTER[0X550] = 180km]

Name: VHIL_H100_VehFunc_ODO_Rollback_MaxValue_999999km
Test Case Description: To verify the ODO value doesn’t rolls back to 0, when Odometer value reach the maximum value (999999km)
Pre-Action:
1.Set Battery Voltage to 13.5V

2.Turn Ignition ON[HIL_Mdl_Ignition_SW_IP= 1]

3.Crank the vehicle[HIL_Mdl_Engine_Start_SW=1]

4.No CAN failure & ODO related failure should not be present

5.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS= Neutral [GEAR_POSITION[0x150=0x2]

6.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED = 0kmph
Test Steps.Action:
1.Write ODO value through DID value[E119] = 999999km [ODO_CLUSTER[0X550] = 999999]

At step 1

Cluster should display,

a)ODO_CLUSTER [0x550] = "999999"km

b)Neutral gear, 0Kmph

2.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS= 3 [GEAR_POSITION[0x150=0x7]; 3 Gear]

3.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED ~= 40kmph

4. Drive the vehicle for 1Km [Scenario to be decided]

At step 4

Cluster should display,

a) ODO doesnt roll back to "0"Km and should remain at maximum value

b)3 gear, 40kmph
Post-Action:
1.Turn Ignition OFF[HIL_Mdl_Ignition_SW_IP= 0]

2. Set Battery Voltage to 0V

Name: VHIL_H100_VehFunc_ODO_Resolution_1km_Above100000
Test Case Description: To verify the Odometer resolution is 1km  when the displayed ODO value is >=100000
Pre-Action:
1.Set Battery Voltage to 13.5V

2.Turn Ignition ON[Ignition_SW_IP= 1]

3. Crank the vehicle[HIL_Engine_Start_SW=1]

4.No CAN failure & ODO related failure should not be present

5.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS= Neutral [GEAR_POSITION[0x150=0x2]

6.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED = 0kmph
Test Steps.Action:
1..Write ODO value through DID value[E119] = 100000km [ODO_CLUSTER[0X550] = 100000]

At step 1

Cluster should display,

a)ODO_CLUSTER [0x550] = "100000"km

b)Neutral gear, 0Kmph

2.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS= 3 [GEAR_POSITION[0x150=0x7]; 3 Gear]

3.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED = 40kmph

4. Drive the vehicle for 1 Km [Scenario to be decided]

5. Verify the ODO value after step 4

At step 5

Cluster should display,

a) ODO_CLUSTER [0x550] = "100001"km (Resolution of 1Km)

b) 3 gear, 40kmph

c) Distance_Rear = Calculated as per WSS_REAR_IP
Post-Action:
1.Turn Ignition OFF[Ignition_SW_IP= 0]

2. Set Battery Voltage to 0V

Name: VHIL_H100_VehFunc_ODO_Resolution_0_1km_Below999999_9
Test Case Description: To verify the Odometer resolution is 1 km  when the displayed ODO value is below 999999Km
Pre-Action:
1.Set Battery Voltage to 13.5V

2.Turn Ignition ON[HIL_Mdl_Ignition_SW_IP= 1]

3. Crank the vehicle[HIL_Mdl_Engine_Start_SW=1]

4.No CAN failure & ODO related failure should not be present

5.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS= Neutral [GEAR_POSITION[0x150=0x2]

6.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED = 0kmph
Test Steps.Action:
1..Write ODO value through DID value[E119] = 999998km [ODO_CLUSTER[0X550] = 999998]

At step 1

Cluster should display,

a)ODO_CLUSTER [0x550] = "999998"km

b)Neutral gear, 0Kmph

2.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS= 1 [GEAR_POSITION[0x150=0x1]; 1 Gear]

3.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED ~= 10kmph

4. Drive the vehicle for 0.9 Km [Scenario to be decided]

At step 4

Cluster should display,

a) ODO_CLUSTER [0x550] = "999998"km (Resolution of 1 Km)

b) 1 gear, 10kmph

5. Continue driving for 1 Km [Scenario to be decided]

At step 5

Cluster should not display,

a) ODO_CLUSTER [0x550] = "999999"km (Resolution of 1 Km)

b) 1 gear, 10kmph
Post-Action:
1.Turn Ignition OFF[HIL_Mdl_Ignition_SW_IP= 0]

2. Set Battery Voltage to 0V

Name: VHIL_H100_VehFunc_ODO_Function_IgnitionCycles
Test Case Description: To verify the Odometer functioning during ignition cycles
Pre-Action:
1.Set Battery Voltage to 13.5V

2.Turn Ignition ON[Ignition_SW_IP= 1]

3. Crank the vehicle[HIL_Engine_Start_SW=1]

4.No CAN failure & ODO related failure should not be present

5.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS= Neutral [GEAR_POSITION[0x150=0x2]

6.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED = 0kmph
Test Steps.Action:
1.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS= 5th [GEAR_POSITION[0x150=0xB]

2.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED = 90kmph

3.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve [ODO_CLUSTER[0X550] = 160km]

At step 3:

Cluster should display,

a)ODO_CLUSTER [0x550] = "160"km

b)3rd gear, 90Kmph

4. Ride for 5 minutes(Approx) and Turn Ignition OFF[Ignition_SW_IP= 0]

At step 4:

Cluster display is OFF and the Odometer is not functional

5. Monitor ODO value after step 2

6. Turn Ignition ON[Ignition_SW_IP= 1]

7.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS= Neutral [GEAR_POSITION[0x150=0x2]

8.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED = 0kmph

At step 8:

Cluster should display,

a)ODO_CLUSTER [0x550] = "180"km

b)Neutral gear, 0Kmph
Post-Action:
1.Turn Ignition OFF[Ignition_SW_IP= 0]

2. Set Battery Voltage to 0V

Name: VHIL_H100_VehFunc_ODO_Update_Every100m_LeadingZeros
Test Case Description: To verify the ODO value is updated for every 100m with leading zeros till the ODO value reaches to 0.9 KM
Pre-Action:
1.Set Battery Voltage to 13.5V

2.Turn Ignition ON[Ignition_SW_IP= 1]

3. Crank the vehicle[HIL_Engine_Start_SW=1]

4.No CAN failure & ODO related failure should not be present

5.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS= Neutral [GEAR_POSITION[0x150=0x2]

6.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED = 0kmph
Test Steps.Action:
1. Write ODO value through DID value[E119] = 0km [ODO_CLUSTER[0X550] = 0]

At Step 1

Cluster should display

a) ODO_CLUSTER [0x550] = "0"km

b)Neutral, 0kmph

2.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS= 1 [GEAR_POSITION[0x150=0x1]; 1 Gear]

3.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED ~= 10kmph

4.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve [ODO_CLUSTER[0X550] = 0.5km]

At step 4

Cluster Should display

a) ODO_CLUSTER [0x550] = "0.5"Km (Leading Zero is added)

b) 1st Gear, 10Kmph

5.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve [ODO_CLUSTER[0X550] = 1.5km]

6. Verify the ODO value after step 5

At step 6

Cluster Should display

a) ODO_CLUSTER [0x550] = "2.5"Km (Leading Zero is suppressed)

b) 1st Gear, 6Kmph
Post-Action:
1.Turn Ignition OFF[Ignition_SW_IP= 0]

2. Set Battery Voltage to 0V

Name: VHIL_H100_VehFunc_ODO_Update_FrontWSSDefective_4thGear
Test Case Description: To verify the ODO value updation, when the Front WSS is defective at 4th gear speed of 40kmph
Pre-Action:
1.Set Battery Voltage to 13.5V

2.Turn Ignition ON[Ignition_SW_IP= 1]

3.Crank the vehicle[HIL_Engine_Start_SW=1]

4.No CAN failure & ODO related failure should not be present

5.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS= Neutral [GEAR_POSITION[0x150=0x2]

6.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED = 0kmph
Test Steps.Action:
1.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS= 4th[GEAR_POSITION[0x150=0x8]

2.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED = 43kmph.

3.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve [ODO_CLUSTER[0X550] = 160km]

At step 3:

Cluster should display,

a)ODO_CLUSTER [0x550] = "160"km

b)4th gear, 43Kmph

4.a.Perform Open Circuit for [WSS_REAR_IP]

BUS_ABS_DATA_3_0x451_WHEEL_SPEED_FRONT[0x451=0x2]; Sensor Defect

4.b.Simulate WSS_REAR_IP to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED = 40kmph

At step 4

ABS should publish,

a)WHEEL_SPEED_FRONT= Invalid

b)WHEEL_SPEED_REAR = 40kmph

c)DISTANCE_FRONT = INVALID

d)DISTANCE_ REAR= Calculated as per WSS_REAR_IP

e)BUS_ABS_DATA_3_0x451_WHEEL_SPEED_REAR[0x451=0x2]; Sensor in order

5. Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve [ODO_CLUSTER[0X550] = 162km]

At step 5

Cluster should display,

a)ODO_CLUSTER [0x550] = "162"km

b) 4th Gear, 43Kmph
Post-Action:
1.Turn Ignition OFF[Ignition_SW_IP= 0]

2. Set Battery Voltage to 0V

BUS_ABS_DATA_3_0x451_WHEEL_SPEED_REAR[0x451=0x2]; Sensor Defect

Name: VHIL_H100_VehFunc_TripA_Rollback_MaxValue_999999_km
Test Case Description: To verify the Trip A Distance value doesn’t rolls back to 0, when trip Odometer value reach the maximum value (999999km)
Pre-Action:
1.Set Battery Voltage to 13.5V

2.Turn Ignition ON[HIL_Mdl_Ignition_SW_IP= 1]

1.Write ODO value through DID value[E119] = 999999km [ODO_CLUSTER[0X550] = 999999]

2.Verify Trip A distance ( Goto Menu -> Trip Details -> Trip A)

a) TRIP A Distance as "999999"km

b) ODO_CLUSTER [0x550] = "999999"km

c) Neutral gear, 0Kmph

At step 6

Cluster should display,

a) TRIP A Distance as "999999"Km ( doesnt Roll Over to 0)

b) ODO_CLUSTER [0x550] = "999999"km (Resolution of 1 Km)

c) 3rd gear, 40Kmph
Post-Action:

2. Set Battery Voltage to 0V

Name: VHIL_H100_VehFunc_Trip_Update_LeadingZeros_Till0_9km
Test Case Description: To verify the Trip meter  is updated with leading zeros till the trip value reaches to 0.9 KM
Pre-Action:
1.Set Battery Voltage to 13.5V

2.Turn Ignition ON[Ignition_SW_IP= 1]

3.Crank the vehicle[HIL_Engine_Start_SW=1]

4.No CAN failure & ODO related failure should not be present

5.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS= Neutral [GEAR_POSITION[0x150=0x2]

6.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED = 0kmph

1. Write ODO value through DID value[E119] = 0km [ODO_CLUSTER[0X550] = 0]

At Step 1

Cluster should display

a) Trip A Distance as "0"km

b) ODO_CLUSTER [0x550] = "0"km

c)Neutral, 0kmph

3.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED ~= 10kmph

c) 1st Gear, 10Kmph
